plot: Rare, unedited recordings of Dr. Steve Brule's extremely short-lived TV show. These videotapes would fetch tons of dollars at a standard auction, but now Adult Swim is bringing these rarely-seen treasures to a general audience! See Dr. Steve learn about restaurants, spend time with his family, conquer his fears, and more throughout six informative episodes! Featuring guest appearances by Jan Skylar, Wayne Skylar, and David Liebe Hart! (These episodes are in somewhat poor condition and are presented in their original broadcast entirety.)   Written by  boonose
title: Check it Out! with Dr. Steve Brule
